description:
Customize your truck in all-American style. With six unique USA themed paint jobs, you can create a truck that perfectly suits your love for the United States of America.  

About USA Paint Jobs DLC
Whether itâ€™s the American flag on your truck, the U.S. National Symbol or the Statue of Liberty, with this pack you can drive around in Truck Driver with American pride. All paint jobs are applicable to every in-game truck. The pack includes:

-American flag
-American Bald Eagle 
-Route 66 emblem
-Washington D.C. skyline
-Statue of Liberty
-Monument Valley
name: Truck Driver - USA Paint Jobs DLC
